prTitle: feat: implement authentication context and voter login UI for PTA voting system
prBody:
## Summary

Implemented Sprint 1 of the PTA voting system (#115) with comprehensive authentication context and voter login UI. This establishes the foundation for the voting system with secure email-based verification and session management.

### Backend Implementation

**Voting Infrastructure:**
- ✅ Created thread-safe voting data store with in-memory storage
- ✅ Implemented comprehensive voting models (Voter, Candidate, Vote, Session, Election)
- ✅ Built voter authentication service with email/verification code flow
- ✅ Added voting service for ballot operations and vote casting
- ✅ Created middleware for voter session validation
- ✅ Set up FastAPI routes for authentication and voting endpoints
- ✅ Integrated voting system with main FastAPI application

**Authentication Features:**
- Email-based voter verification with 6-digit codes
- JWT-based session management (2-hour voting sessions)
- Anonymous vote storage (no voter_id in vote records)
- Comprehensive audit logging for voter actions
- Thread-safe operations with proper locking

### Frontend Implementation

**Authentication Context:**
- ✅ Created React AuthProvider with useAuth hook
- ✅ Implemented state management for authentication flow
- ✅ Added token storage and validation
- ✅ Built error handling and loading states

**Voter Login UI:**
- ✅ Two-step authentication flow (email → verification code)
- ✅ Responsive design with proper form validation
- ✅ Real-time input validation and error messaging
- ✅ Loading states and user feedback
- ✅ Email validation and code format enforcement

**Integration:**
- ✅ Created Axios-based API client with interceptors
- ✅ Integrated voting system into main app routing
- ✅ Updated navigation with voting system link
- ✅ Built voting app wrapper with authentication flow

### Technical Details

**Backend API Endpoints:**
- `POST /voting/auth/request-code` - Request verification code
- `POST /voting/auth/verify` - Verify code and get session token
- `GET /voting/ballot` - Get candidates and voting options
- `POST /voting/vote` - Cast anonymous votes
- `GET /voting/status` - Get voter's voting status
- `GET /voting/health` - Health check

**Security Features:**
- Anonymous voting (votes contain no voter identification)
- JWT tokens with 2-hour expiration
- Verification codes with email validation
- Audit trail for voter actions (without vote choices)
- CORS configuration for frontend integration

**Data Models:**
- Voter: email-based registration with voted positions tracking
- Candidate: name, bio, photo, position assignment
- Vote: anonymous with position and candidate only
- Session: JWT-based with expiration
- Election: configurable positions and status

### Code Quality Improvements

- ✅ Fixed ESLint warnings:
  - Removed unused `useState` import in `App.jsx`
  - Fixed unescaped apostrophe entity in `VoterLogin.jsx`
- ✅ Frontend builds successfully with no lint errors
- ✅ All components pass code quality checks

### Development Setup

**Dependencies Added:**
- Frontend: axios for HTTP client
- Backend: FastAPI, Pydantic, JWT dependencies
- All builds pass and components are integration-ready

### Testing

- ✅ Frontend builds successfully
- ✅ All React components render without errors
- ✅ Authentication flow is complete and functional
- ✅ API routes are properly structured and integrated
- ✅ Error handling and validation work correctly
- ✅ Code passes ESLint with zero warnings

### Sprint 1 Completion

This implementation completes Sprint 1 requirements:
- ✅ Voter authentication infrastructure
- ✅ Email verification system
- ✅ Authentication context for React
- ✅ Voter login UI with two-step verification
- ✅ API integration and routing
- ✅ Code quality and build verification

The system is ready for Sprint 2 (Admin functionality) and Sprint 3 (Voting interface).

Closes #115
